Export.Routine:
WWWFORMBIT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; BITMAP SUCHFORMULAR ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 14-Jan-2009 GRF SR16253: during upgrade compile; Doco; quits ; 14.04.2004 FIS Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YDATEI,YLFN,YFULLTEXT,YTAB,YFRAGE,YMAX,YHTMFORM,YTABINDEX,YHELPTXT,YSHOWSUM SET YDATEI=$PIECE(YVOR,Y,11) ;KLASSE ;class IF YDATEI="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(33),1) QUIT ;KEINE DATEIVORGABE ;no IF '$DATA(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(33),1) QUIT ;KEINE DATEIVORGABE ;no IF '$DATA(@("^"_YDATEI_"b")) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(46),1) QUIT ;KEINE DATEN ;no SET YHTMFORM="WWW2" ;KEY-EVENTS DO . WRITE YCR . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"
" IF '$DATA(^WWW122(0,YFORM)) IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO . IF $GET(YDREID)'=1 WRITE YCR,"
" . IF +$GET(YDREID)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" ;FIS;31.03.04;25445;RAHMEN 2-FARBIG . WRITE ""_$$^WWWTEXT(47)_"" ;SELECT WRITE YCR,"" ;HILFETEXT ;SET YHELPTXT=$PIECE($GET(^WWW127(YM,YFORM,"M",1,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1) SET YHELPTXT=$PIECE($GET(^WWW127(0,YFORM,"M",1,SPRACHE,1)),Y,1) ; ;07.06.04;FAN;ZENTRALE DATEI;25866 IF YHELPTXT'="" SET YHELPTXT=$$^WWWTRANSLATE(YHELPTXT,"|","\n") IF $TRANSLATE(YHELPTXT," ")="" SET YHELPTXT=$$^WWWTEXT(28,,1) ;KEIN HILFETEXT HINTERLEGT ;no SET YTABINDEX=1 DO SELECT IF '$DATA(^WWW122(0,YFORM)) IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"" IF '$DATA(^WWW122(0,YFORM)) IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO . IF $GET(YDREID)'=1 WRITE YCR,"
" . IF +$GET(YDREID)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" ;FIS;31.03.04;25445;RAHMEN 2-FARBIG . WRITE ""_$$^WWWTEXT(33529)_"" ;RESULT DO RESULT IF '$DATA(^WWW122(0,YFORM)) IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"
" QUIT SELECT ;SELECTION SET YFULLTEXT=0 SET YSHOWSUM=0 KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"SORT") WRITE YCR,"" ;SUCHE BIT FÜR BIT ;search bit to bit SET YLFN="" FOR SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN)) QUIT:YLFN="" DO . SET YFDAT1=$GET(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)) ;DATENFELDDEFINITION . QUIT:YFDAT1="" . ; . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,5)=1 SET YFULLTEXT=1 QUIT ;VOLLTEXTSUCHE . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,3)=1 SET YSHOWSUM=1 QUIT ;SUMMENANZEIGE . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,4)'=1 QUIT ;NUR WENN EINZELN ;only when special . ; . SET YFRAGE=$$^WWWFELDNAME(YDATEI,"D",YLFN) . IF $EXTRACT(YFRAGE,1,5)="_FREE" QUIT . SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"SORT",YLFN)=YFRAGE ;FIS;14.07.04;ZWISCHENSPEICHERN DAMIT VOLLTEXTSUCHE OBEN ;therewith upstairs ;VOLLTEXTSUCHE IF YFULLTEXT=1 DO . SET YLFN=9999 . SET YFRAGE=$$^WWWTEXT(33033) ;VOLLTEXTSUCHE . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE "" SET YTAB=0 SET YLFN="" FOR SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"SORT",YLFN)) QUIT:YLFN="" DO . SET YFDAT1=$GET(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)) ;DATENFELDDEFINITION . ; . NEW TYP,REL,PARA,RELF,LENGTH . SET YFRAGE=$GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"SORT",YLFN)) . SET REL =$PIECE(YFDAT1,Y,8) ;RELATIONSDATEI (PARAMETER) . SET PARA=$PIECE(YFDAT1,Y,9) ;KEY FÜR RELATIONSDATEI (Z.B. SPRACHE) ;KEY to . SET RELF=$PIECE(YFDAT1,Y,10) ;ANZUZEIGENDES FELD AUS RELATIONSDATEI ;field out of . IF +RELF=0 SET RELF=1 . IF REL'="INPARA" IF REL'="WWW100" IF REL'="WWW101" IF PARA'="" SET REL="" . QUIT:REL="" . IF YTAB=0 WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . IF YTAB=0 SET YTAB=1 QUIT . SET YTAB=0 . WRITE "" IF YTAB=1 WRITE "" WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR," " . WRITE $EXTRACT(YFRAGE,1,35) . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE "" . ; . ;WRITE YCR,"" . SET ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","X"_YDATEI_"D"_YLFN,1)=1 ;VORBELEGEN SUCHLOGIK: UND ;And . ; . WRITE "
" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR," " . WRITE $EXTRACT(YFRAGE,1,35) . WRITE YCR,"" . ;WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE "		" . ; . DO . . WRITE YCR,"" . . DO ^WWWFORM73(YDATEI,"D",YLFN) ;AUFBEREITEN FELDAUSWAHL . . SET ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","X"_YDATEI_"D"_YLFN,1)=1 ;VORBELEGEN SUCHLOGIK: UND ;And . ; . WRITE "
 
" KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"SORT") QUIT RESULT ;SHOW RESULT NEW YMAX SET YMAX=+$$^WWWBITCOUNT(YDATEI) WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR," " WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(402) ;ANZAHL DATENSÄTZE INSGESAMT ;Number together WRITE YCR,": " WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR," " WRITE YCR,YMAX WRITE YCR," " WRITE YCR,"
" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR," " WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33529) ;ANZAHL DATENSÄTZE ;Number WRITE ": " WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR," " WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,YCR,"" DO ;ANZEIGEN SUCHERGEBNIS ;display . WRITE YCR . WRITE " 0) { window.location.href='"_YAKTION_"EP=WWWMANU&YEXEC=DO|SHOW^WWWFORMBIT&YBACK="_YFORM_",&YFORM="_YFORM_"&YKEY="_YDATEI . NEW YFORM,YKEY,YBACK,YDATEI . DO ^WWWCGI . WRITE "'} else alert('"_$$^WWWTEXT(119)_"');"_"""" ;KEINE DATEN GEFUNDEN . WRITE YCR," tabindex="_YTABINDEX . WRITE ">" . WRITE YCR,"" ;ANZEIGEN ;give notice ;display . WRITE "" WRITE YCR,"
" ;ANZEIGEN SUMMENFELDER;FIS;25940;21.06.04 IF YSHOWSUM=1 DO . IF '$DATA(^WWW122(0,YFORM)) IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO . . WRITE YCR,"" . . IF $GET(YDREID)'=1 WRITE YCR,"
" . . IF +$GET(YDREID)=1 WRITE YCR,"
" ;FIS;31.03.04;25445;RAHMEN 2-FARBIG . . ;WRITE ""_$$^WWWTEXT(33529)_"" ;RESULT . ; . SET YTAB=3 . SET YTAB(1)=0 . WRITE YCR,"" . SET YLFN="" FOR SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN)) QUIT:YLFN="" DO . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,3)'=1 QUIT ;NUR WENN SUMMENBILDUNG ;only when . . ; . . NEW YTYP,YVALUE . . SET YFRAGE=$$^WWWFELDNAME(YDATEI,"D",YLFN) . . IF $EXTRACT(YFRAGE,1,5)="_FREE" QUIT . . SET YTYP=$PIECE($GET(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,3) . . IF YTAB#3=0 WRITE YCR,"" SET YTAB(1)=1 . . WRITE YCR,"" . . SET YTAB=YTAB+1 . . IF YTAB#3=0 WRITE "" SET YTAB(1)=0 . ; . IF YTAB=4 DO . . WRITE YCR,"" . ; . IF YTAB(1)=1 WRITE "" . WRITE YCR,"
" . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE YCR," " . . WRITE $EXTRACT(YFRAGE,1,35) . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE "" . . WRITE YCR,"" . . WRITE " " . . IF YTYP=8 WRITE ""_$$^WWWWHR(YWHR)_"" . . SET YVALUE=$$^WWWBITCOUNT(YDATEI,YLFN) ;GESAMT;FIS;14.07.04 ;total . . DO . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . . WRITE YCR,"" . . ; . . WRITE "
" . . WRITE YCR," " . . WRITE "
" QUIT SHOW ;SHOW SEARCH RESULT ;NEW YMAX,YSUCH,YSUCH1,YSUCHV,YFELDER,YLFN NEW YFORM1 SET YFORM =$GET(YFORM) SET YDATEI=$GET(YKEY) SET YFORM1=YFORM DO ^WWWUP(0) DO . NEW YKEY . SET YKEY=" " . DO ^WWWBACK IF YFORM="" QUIT ;YSUCH1="FORMULAR;DATEI;SORTKEY;VORGABEKEY|VORGABEDATEN;ANZEIGE KEY;ANZEIGEFELD;STD SORT;ANZEIGE ERGEBNIS;ORIENTIERUNG;ANZAHL ANZEIGEN;FIXKEY;FELDER MIT SUMMENBILDUNG;WELCHEN KEY UEBERGEBEN; SET YSUCH="" SET YSUCH1="" SET YSUCHV="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,"")) IF YSUCH'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)),Y,13)'="" IF $ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH))'="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH)) IF YSUCH'="" IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)),Y,13)'="" IF $ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH))'="" SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH)) IF YSUCH'="" SET YSUCHV=$GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YSUCH,1)) IF $PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,2)'="" SET YDATEI=$PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,2) IF YSUCH="" IF $DATA(^WWW123(0,YDATEI)) DO ;SUCHVORGABE AUS KLASSE ;out of groovy . SET YSUCH=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YDATEI,"")) . IF YSUCH'="" SET YSUCHV=$GET(^WWW123(0,YDATEI,YSUCH,1)) IF YDATEI'="" IF $DATA(^WWW120(0,YDATEI)) SET YFORM1=YDATEI IF YDATEI="" SET YDATEI=YFORM DO . NEW ANZAB,ANZAHL . SET ANZAB=1 . SET ANZAHL=100 . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","YANZAB",1),Y,1)=ANZAB . SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","YANZAHL",1),Y,1)=ANZAHL . KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"KEY") ;KILL VORAUSWAHL . ;DO BITSEARCH^WWWSEARBIT2(YDATEI) . DO BITSEARCH^WWWSEARBIT2(YDATEI,,1) ;EXPAND SEARCH . SET YMAX=$PIECE($GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","YRESULT",1)),Y,1) SET YFELDER=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,6),";",",") SET YFELDER1=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,16),";",",") SET YLFN="" FOR SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWW001B(0,YDATEI,YLFN),-1) QUIT:YLFN="" DO ;BITFELDER ERGÄNZEN ;07.06.04;FAN;ZENTRALE DATEI;25866 . IF '$FIND(","_YFELDER_",",","_YLFN_",") SET YFELDER=YFELDER_","_YLFN SET YFELDER1=YFELDER1_","_YLFN IF $EXTRACT(YFELDER)="," SET YFELDER = $EXTRACT(YFELDER,2,999) IF $EXTRACT(YFELDER1)="," SET YFELDER1 = $EXTRACT(YFELDER1,2,999) SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,1)=YFORM1 ;FORMULAR ;form SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,2)=YDATEI ;DATEI ;data file SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,3)="" ;SORTKEY SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,4)="" ;VORGABEKEY|VORGABEDATEN SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,5),";",",") ;ANZEIGE KEY IF $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5)="" DO . NEW YI,YMAXKEY . SET YMAXKEY=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5)=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5)_","_YI ;ANZEIGE KEY ;Show KEY . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5))="," SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,5),2,999) SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,6)=YFELDER ;ANZEIGEFELD SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,7)="" ;STD SORT SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,8)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,8),";",",") ;ANZEIGEERGEBNIS SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,9)=1 ;ORIENTIERUNG SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,10)=100 ;ANZAHL MAX. 100 ;Number SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,11)="" ;FIXKEY SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,11)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,12),";",",") ;FELDER MIT SUMMENBILDUNG SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,12)=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YSUCHV,Y,13),";",",") ;WELCHEN KEY ÜBERGEBEN SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,16)=YFELDER1 ;REIHENFOLGE DATENFELDER ;row SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,17)="" ;FIXVORGABE SORTKEY SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,20)="::"_$$^WWWTEXT(33529) ;SUCHERGEBNIS IF YMAX>0 SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,20)=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,20)_" ("_YMAX_")" IF YMAX>100 SET $PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,20)=$PIECE(YSUCH1,Y,20)_"  "_$$^WWWTEXT(33847)_"" SET YNOSORT=1 DO . NEW YFORM . SET YFORM=YFORM1 . DO ^WWWSEAR3 DO ^WWWUP(1) QUIT
